amendment.description: Amendment reduces by half the amount of funding for Pakistan under title IX of the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce the amount for "Operation and Maintenance, Defense-Wide" for payments to reimburse key cooperating nations for logistical, military and other support by $650,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Poe (TX) amendment (A035) Agreed to by voice vote.
